description: By Father Murtaugh O'Lavery. Priest of the parishes of St John's, Dromore, and Machrelin. Upon the death of one of his parishioners. To which is added, the consecration of a murderer of heretick princes; used by the Jesuits in popish countries. Also, a number of popish miracles..| Father Murtaugh O'Lavery is a pseudonym.| In verse.
